<Text: Talk to the Press

Text: Talk to the Press:  The company provides an outlet for individuals who wish to sell their stories and specialises in feature stories of a personal nature that range from dealing with the credit crunch to teen prostitution.
Triplets:<Talk to the Press
2:
--------------------
Text: Talk to the Press:  Its articles predominantly appear in tabloid newspapers including "The Daily Mail", "The Sun" and "The Daily Mirror", and in women's magazines such as "Closer", "Reveal", "Bella" and "Take a Break".
Triplets:<tabloid newspapers
